Data Transfer Object containing key database metrics for monitoring, diagnostics, and user-facing statistics dashboards.

public class DatabaseStatsDto

Remarks

This DTO aggregates statistics from multiple repositories to provide a comprehensive view of the application's data footprint and health.

Used in:

  • Main dashboard (summary cards)
  • Health monitoring endpoints
  • Backup status displays
  • System diagnostics
